card.name: Caught in the Brights {2}{W}8 Caught in the Brights
card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can’t attack or block. When a Vehicle you control attacks, exile enchanted creature.
card.flavor: Mrudni be tupak!

card.name: Ginka's Reproach*
card.rules: Ginka’s Reproach* deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
card.flavor: Na Poduyane, Ginka beshe popitana za cigara ot narkoman. No tya znae i vinagi e znaela che takiva recidivisti ne zaslujavat dori malko proshka.

card.name: Glorious Anthem*
card.rules: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Kataki, War's Wage
card.rules: All artifacts have “At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay 1.”
card.flavor: “Predi vremeto na tehnologiite i materialnite cennosti, takiva reprinti nqmashe” -Dyado Dobri

card.name: Loyal Companion*
card.flavor: “bal bal bal” — Sharo

card.name: Archaeomancer
card.rules: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavor: “...a TI pomnish li profila si v gepime.com ot predi 9 godini, a?”

card.name: Clever Impersonator
card.rules: You may have Clever Impersonator enter the battlefield as a copy of any nonland permanent on the battlefield
card.flavor: Vseki aktyor moje da e policai ili dqdo. No samo istinskiq showmen moje da izigrae motika!

card.name: Sleep
card.rules: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don’t untap during that player’s next untap step.
card.flavor: “...sred postradalite osem sa pet detsa na vazrast mezhdu 7 i 14 godini i chetirima vazrastni, saobshti frenskoto vatreshno ministerstvo, tsitirano ot Royters...”

card.name: TV Nation*
card.rules: Draw two cards
card.flavor: “Half of your studies will be learning the laws. The other half will be bending them.” —Boko Rissov, master warlock

card.name: Corrupt Official
card.rules: 2B: Regenerate Corrupt Official. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.) Whenever Corrupt Official becomes blocked, defending player discards a card at random.
card.flavor: His favor comes at a high price.

card.name: Erection Defiler*
card.rules: 1B, T: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
card.flavor: “The third stage of the illness: muscle aches and persistent cough.” —Phyrexian progress notes

card.name: Fallen Angel
card.rules: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Priqtelqt mi beshe vremenen.

card.name: Nekrataal
card.rules: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can’t be regenerated.
card.flavor: His victims don’t have time to feel despair.

card.name: Shiban Lakom*
card.rules: Skulk (This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.) 1: Shiban Lakom* gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: “He’s just playing with us, Vasilev.”

card.name: Sign in Blood*
card.rules: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
card.flavor: Znaete po kolko podpisa slagam na den. Ne se gordeya ot tova, koeto e napravila administratsiyata. — v otgovor na obvineniya, che e slozhil podpisa si pod neizgodna sdelka s Hristo Kovachki.

card.name: *tormenting voice 2
card.rules: Draw a card. Each player discards two cards, then draws two cards.

card.name: Atog
card.rules: Sacrifice an artifact: Atog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor: On Dominaria, a scavenger. On Mirrodin, a predator. In Absurdistan, an opportunist.

card.name: Caffeinate
card.rules: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. Draw a card.
card.flavor: Mmm, edin dobur den! : )

card.name: Fire Whip
card.rules: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has “T: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.” Sacrifice Fire Whip: Fire Whip deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Hijack
card.rules: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
card.flavor: V nqkoi kvartali ne trqbva da si ostavqsh daje i boklucite bez nadzor.

card.name: Hijack2
card.rules: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
card.flavor: V nqkoi kvartali ne trqbva da si ostavqsh daje i boklucite bez nadzor.

card.name: Hordeling Outburst
card.rules: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
card.flavor: hAIDE IDVAITE DA PRAVIM SNIMKA

card.name: Lightning Strike
card.rules: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
card.flavor: uf!

card.name: Mangal Vandal
card.rules: When Mangal Vandal enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
card.flavor: Berem si prosto, gospodin, nie losho ne pravime. ( tiho sali )

card.name: Mugging
card.rules: Mugging deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature can’t block this turn.
card.flavor: ...eeE!

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.rules: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: pfftbtbpftf

card.name: Alpha Autority
card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has hexproof and can’t be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Blunt the Assault
card.rules: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
card.flavor: “Nea smis1l tva kade go praite brat, pofni i viish che e tolko zabavno kolkoto i da se biesh brat.”

card.name: Cultivate
card.rules: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Madwoods Gang*
card.flavor: ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets ludogorets

card.name: Clan Defiance
card.rules: Choose one or more — • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Undermine*
card.rules: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.
card.flavor: “Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?” -Ivan Kostov

card.name: *Post-Play Angel
card.rules: Flying T, Sacrifice X lands: Put X +1/+1 counters on *Post-Play Angel.
card.flavor: “When people made cosplays, people called for a goddess. My angel is far superior to others.” —Gery, Kurvertor

card.name: Cultivator's Caravan
card.rules: T: Add one mana of any color. Crew 3 (Tap any number of untapped creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: This permanent becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Heavy Moticc*
card.rules: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. As long as equipped creature is a Human, it gets an additional +1/+1. Equip 2

card.name: Meteor Golem
card.rules: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
card.flavor: Mnogo kato tebe veche plakaha.

card.name: Evolving Wilds*
card.rules: T, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Chaos Warp
card.rules: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it’s a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: “Aidee proverka dali vseki kandidat e homoseksualist”

card.name: Goblin Swine-Rider
card.rules: Whenever Goblin Swine-Rider becomes blocked, it deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and each blocking creature.
card.flavor: Hghaide de!

card.name: Tormenting Voice
card.rules: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.
card.flavor: Ti si burqta v surceto mi...

card.name: Fog
card.rules: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
